JIPipe OSX Installer
--------------------

The code in this folder will create an OSX app that bootstraps ImageJ and JIPipe.

Requirements
------------

* Platypus (https://github.com/sveinbjornt/Platypus)
* JIPipe binaries in a folder "jipipe-bin"

Creating the app
----------------

1. Open Platypus and load the profile
2. Ensure that the "jipipe-bin" folder is added to the resources
3. Build the package
